SELECT /* cargoMaster.cargoSearchImport */ 'BL' AS DIV, CM.OPE_CLASS_CD AS OPECLASSCD, BL.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, BL.BL_NO AS BLSN, '' AS CGNO, CM.SHIPG_AGNT AS SHIPGAGNT, CM.FWR_AGNT AS FWRAGNT, BL.DELV_TP_CD AS DELVTPCD, BL.CMDT_CD AS CMDTCD, CM.CG_WGT AS GRSMT, CM.PKG_QTY AS GRSQTY, VS2.DIR_MT AS DIRMT, VS2.DIR_QTY AS DIRQTY, VS2.IND_MT AS INDMT, VS2.IND_QTY AS INDQTY, WH.NOR_MT AS NORMT, WH.NOR_QTY AS NORQTY, WH.DMG_MT AS DMGMT, WH.DMG_QTY AS DMGQTY, WH.SHU_MT AS SHUMT, WH.SHU_QTY AS SHUQTY, GP.GP_MT AS GPMT, GP.GP_QTY AS GPQTY
FROM TMT_CG_MST CM, TMT_BL BL LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO AS CG_NO, SUM( CASE DELV_TP_CD WHEN 'D' THEN ISNULL(CG_WGT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS DIR_MT, SUM( CASE DELV_TP_CD WHEN 'D' THEN ISNULL(PKG_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS DIR_QTY, SUM( CASE DELV_TP_CD WHEN 'I' THEN ISNULL(CG_WGT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS IND_MT, SUM( CASE DELV_TP_CD WHEN 'I' THEN ISNULL(PKG_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS IND_QTY
FROM TMT_JOB WHERE 1 = 1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO ) VS ON BL.VSL_CALL_ID = VS.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = VS.CG_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO AS CG_NO, SUM( ISNULL(CG_WGT,0)) AS GRS_MT, SUM( ISNULL(PKG_QTY,0)) AS GRS_QTY, SUM( CASE WHEN 'D' THEN ISNULL(CG_WGT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS DIR_MT, SUM( CASE WHEN 'D' THEN ISNULL(PKG_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS DIR_QTY, SUM( CASE WHEN 'I' THEN ISNULL(CG_WGT, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS IND_MT, SUM( CASE WHEN 'I' THEN ISNULL(PKG_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS IND_QTY
FROM TMT_JOB WHERE 1 = 1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND JOB_TP_CD IN ('LD','DS') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, CG_NO ) VS2 ON BL.VSL_CALL_ID = VS2.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = VS2.CG_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TJ.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, TJ.CG_NO AS CG_NO, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'G' THEN TL.CG_WGT ELSE 0 END ) AS NOR_MT, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'G' THEN TL.PKG_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS NOR_QTY, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'D' THEN TL.CG_WGT ELSE 0 END ) AS DMG_MT, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'D' THEN TL.PKG_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS DMG_QTY, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'S' THEN TL.CG_WGT ELSE 0 END ) AS SHU_MT, SUM( CASE TL.WH_TP_CD WHEN 'S' THEN TL.PKG_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS SHU_QTY
FROM TMT_JOB TJ, TMT_INV_LOC TL WHERE TJ.JOB_NO = TL.JOB_NO
AND TJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY TJ.VSL_CALL_ID,TJ.CG_NO ) WH ON BL.VSL_CALL_ID = WH.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = WH.CG_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT VSL_CALL_ID, CG_IN_OUT_CD, CG_NO, SUM(ISNULL(CG_WGT,0)) AS GP_MT, SUM(ISNULL(PKG_QTY,0)) AS GP_QTY
FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE 1 = 1
AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND (GATE_PASS_NO IS NOT NULL AND GATE_PASS_NO <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, CG_IN_OUT_CD, CG_NO ) GP ON BL.VSL_CALL_ID = GP.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = GP.CG_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = CM.VSL_CALL_ID AND BL.BL_NO = CM.CG_NO
AND BL.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
